name: reuv

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0))
-| wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))
-| wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0))
-| wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))
-| wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))

body.origin: |- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0))
-| wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0)))
-| wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0))
-| wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), w0))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, universe, w0), weu(s0, w0))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)

comment: A unique existential quantifier restricted to the universe is unrestricted. (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2010.)
